verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: ranch potatoes] even after seven years my family still asks for this tasty potato and bacon dish try it once and i 'll bet your family will be hooked too —lynn ireland lebanon wisconsin brown
